Entries.Mon8: I'd love to draw a portrait of Haley sometime.$0#$e#She'd be the most beautiful model ever.$4
Entries.Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#You know, it’s thanks to you and Haley that I was able to come this far with my art.$0#$e#You should come over and have dinner with us sometime, @.$1
Entries.Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know, I'd never move back to the city even though it was difficult to leave everything behind.$0#$b#I love living in the valley, and I have so many plans for Haley and me for the future.$1
Entries.Thu8: I've realised that when I moved here, I wasn't really trying to make new friends because I was still processing all the changes.$0#$b#But, now, I chat with everyone at the saloon, help Marnie with the animals and even have a wonderful relationship with Haley.$1
Entries.Fri8: I was afraid that I was rushing too much with Haley...$2#$b#You know that my previous relationship ended pretty badly and I had no plans to be with anybody when I moved here.$2#$b#But then Haley came and ruined my plans.$0#$e#I'm glad she did, I love her so much.$4
Entries.Sat8: My career as an artist was not going very well when I first moved here...$2#$e#Fortunately, Haley has always believed in me.$0#$b#She is really supportive.$1
Entries.Sun8: I usually see Jas playing near my house.$0#$b#It got me thinking about if Haley'd like to have kids anytime soon...$0
Entries.spring_Mon8: Hey, @.$1#$e#Haley and I have thought about putting on a joint exhibition.$1#$e#You know, we'd display my sculptures and paintings along with Haley's photographs.$0
Entries.spring_Thu8: Oh, hey, @.$1#$e#I was on my way to see Haley.$4#$e#Bye!$0
Entries.spring_Sat8: An old friend of mine from Zuzu City has told me that he's going to present his first art exhibition next month.$1#$b#I'm going with Haley, maybe she could met my parents while we're there.$1

Entries.summer_Fri8: On summer days Haley and I love to go for a swim.$1#$b#We usually go to the beach, but actually the river could also be a good option.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: I should take my watercolors with me the next time I go to the beach.$0#$b#I'd like to do some quick sketches of Haley.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I've been having a terrible artistic block...$2#$e#I should go see Haley for some inspiration...$7

Entries.fall_Sun8: Hey, @!$1#$e#I bought some wine from Pierre's for the dinner I'm having tonight with Emily and Haley.$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: I'm glad that Haley lives so close to me.$0#$e#This way I can visit her often, especially on cold days like this.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: Haley doesn't like winter much, so I try to spend more time with her these days.$0
Entries.winter_Sat8: This year has been the best in my life so far. Seeing how my art reaches more people, being with Haley, having a good relationship with the other townsfolk... What's not to like?$0

Entries.HaleyLeahWedding: Hey, @.$0#$e#Thanks for coming to the wedding!$0#$b#I can't wait to move in with Haley.$4
Emily and I worked really hard on the wedding dresses.$0#$b#DId you like them, @?$1
Hello, @.$0#$e#Haley and Leah are such a cute couple, don't you think?$0
I always have so much fun at weddings.$0#$b#There's food and I can play with Jas.$1
Hello, @.$0#$e#I was really surprised when I received the invitation for the wedding of Haley and Leah.$0#$b#I didn't think they'd get married so soon.$0
Leah sometimes talks to me at the saloon.$0#$b#She's a nice girl, I'm happy she found love.$1
I hope I can officiate another wedding soon.$0#$b#We could even build a little banquet.$1
I should wish Leah luck dealing with Haley for the rest of their lives...$0#$e#Well, actually Haley has grown to be nicer thanks to Leah.$0
The wedding got me thinking...$0#$b#I'm not really into ballads, but it'd be cool to sing at a wedding.$1

Leah was my first friend when I arrived here.$0#$b#I'm delighted to have seen her getting married.$1#$e#She invited me to have dinner with her and Haley, I'll make sure to bring some good wine for the newlyweds.$1
Do you think Miss Haley's dress was the prettier or Miss Leah's?$0#$b#I liked Miss Haley's more.$1
I heard Leah saying they her and Haley were thinking of celebrating their wedding at the beach.$0#$b#That'd have been perfect for a summer wedding.$1
I always saw Haley visiting Leah and taking pictures near her house.$0#$b#They're a wonderful couple.$1
Hello, @.$0#$e#It was hard for me to speak at Haley's wedding.$0#$b#We never really talk about our feelings, and I thought it was the perfect moment to tell her how proud I am to be her sister.$0
Leah always talks about Haley when she comes to the saloon.$0#$b#I can they really love each other.$1
I rearranged the town's flowers for the wedding of Haley and Leah.$0#$b#Alex told me Haley likes sunflowers.$1
Leah and Haley told me about their plans of moving in together after the wedding.$0#$b#They want to remodel Leah's cabin.$0
What's so great about weddings?$0
Lewis won't stop talking about how special is to officiate a wedding.$0#$b#Maybe I should become a wedding officiant apart from being a fisherman.$1
The key to a healthy marriage is communication, to share thoughts and feelings with each other.$0#$b#But I think Haley and Leah won't have any problems with it.$0

Entries.Mon8: Hi, @.$0#$#I want to go to Zuzu City soon with Leah.$0#$e#There's this new shopping mall that has a temporary art exhibition.$1
Entries.Thu8: Leah has talked to me about a photography contest going on in Grampleton.$0#$b#We’re going to choose the pictures later.$1#$e#...or I could directly send in a picture where she's the model, it would win for sure.$4
Entries.Fri8: Watching the sunset with Leah is one of my favorite things in this world.$4
Entries.Sat8: Meeting Leah has led to a major change in my life.$0#$b#Before, I used to despise rural life, but now I wouldn't move for anything in the world.$1
Entries.spring_Mon8: Emily told me that there's a new merchant in the desert.$0#$b#Maybe he sells unique works of art by foreign painters.$0#$e#Leah and I should stop by one day.$0
Entries.spring_Thu8: Leah's hair is super soft.$0#$b#I love to style it in different ways.$1
Entries.spring_Sat8: I'm going to ask Leah to do a photo shoot on the beach.$0#$b#It's going to be so fun!$4#$e#And I'll also get to see Leah in a bikini...$4
Entries.summer_Wed8: Leah and I are going to get some ice cream later.$0#$b#You should come too, @.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: Hi, @.$0#$b#I'm going to ask Leah to go to the beach with me later, when there's no one else.$4
Entries.fall_Mon8: Emily is teaching me how to knit.$0#$b#I want to make a scarf for Leah for the winter.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: I miss summer and going to the beach with Leah...$2
Entries.winter_Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#Don't tell Leah, but I've been saving money to buy a Lupini painting for her at the Night Market.$1#$b#She's going to love it!$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: I'm looking forward to another wonderful year with Leah.$4#$e#I feel like I'm a much better version of my past self now, thanks to her.$1
Entries.winter_Sat8: Leah has a fireplace at her place.$0#$b#I love to sit in front of it and cuddle with her.$4
Entries.summer_27: I usually would take tons of picture at the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies tomorrow, but I think this time I will just enjoy the moment with Leah.$0
Entries.winter_23: Today's a very special day, it's Leah's birthday!$1#$b#I have prepared a surprise birthday party for her.$1
Entries.summer_27_2: I usually would take tons of picture at the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies tomorrow, but I think this time I will just enjoy the moment with Leah.$0
Entries.winter_23_2: Today's a very special day, it's Leah's birthday!$1#$b#I have prepared a surprise birthday party for her.$1

Entries.Wed8: Hi, @.$0#$e#I always thought that I wasn't doing anything productive with my life...$2#$b#You know, I just hung out with Alex from time to time, took some pictures here and there. I didn't even have a job like Emily.$2#$e#But thanks to Leah I've grown so much as a person, I was so happy when she proposed to me.$4#$b#Now I know exactly what I want my future to be.$4
Entries.Tue8: I never really thought about having kids.$0#$b#I was kind of a child myself...$2#$e#But I think that Leah has helped me mature a lot.$0#$b#And we've been talking about kids a lot since our wedding.$1
Entries.Sun8: I decided to stay here because Leah loves the valley and it's a great source of inspiration to her.$0#$b#But now I can't even imagine living elsewhere.$0#$b#I'm looking forward to moving in with Leah soon.$4#$e#I'm going to hang our wedding photos all over our house!$1
Entries.fall_Fri8: Alex and I are good friends, that's why people used to say we were dating.$0#$b#But he's just a friend, he was so happy to hear Leah and I were getting married.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: After our wedding, Leah and I talked about moving in together.$0#$b#I'd love to live in her house, it's so cozy.$1#$e#We'd have to make some reforms, though.$0
Entries.winter_24_2: Hi, @.$0#$e#The Feast of the Winter Star makes me feel really close to this community, we're like a big happy family.$1#$e#It was good talking to you, I have to leave now and prepare Leah's gift for tomorrow.$1

Entries.Mon8: I'd love to draw a portrait of Haley sometime.$0#$e#She'd be the most beautiful model ever.$4
Entries.Tue8: Hi, @.$1#$e#You know, it’s thanks to you and Haley that I was able to come this far with my art.$0#$e#You should come over and have dinner with us sometime, @.$1
Entries.Sat8: My career as an artist was not going very well when I first moved here...$2#$e#Fortunately, Haley has always believed in me.$0#$b#She is really supportive.$1
Entries.Sun8: I usually see Jas playing near my house.$0#$b#It got me thinking about if Haley'd like to have kids anytime soon...$0
Entries.spring_Mon8: Hey, @.$1#$e#Haley and I have thought about putting on a joint exhibition.$1#$e#You know, we'd display my sculptures and paintings along with Haley's photographs.$0
Entries.summer_Wed8: Haley absolutely loves summer.$0#$b#Every day she calls me to go sunbathing with her.$1
Entries.summer_Fri8: On summer days Haley and I love to go for a swim.$1#$b#We usually go to the beach, but actually the river could also be a good option.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: I should take my watercolors with me the next time I go to the beach.$0#$b#I'd like to do some quick sketches of Haley.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: I've been having a terrible artistic block...$2#$e#I should go see Haley for some inspiration...$7
Entries.fall_Fri8: I love walking in the forest with Haley in the fall.$0#$b#The breeze is very pleasant and Haley enjoys taking pictures of the river.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: Hey, @!$1#$e#I bought some wine from Pierre's for the dinner I'm having tonight with Emily and Haley.$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: I'm glad that Haley lives so close to me.$0#$e#This way I can visit her often, especially on cold days like this.$1
Entries.winter_Thu8: Haley doesn't like winter much, so I try to spend more time with her these days.$0
Entries.spring_14: I've spent the last month painting a picture for Haley's birthday.$0#$b#It's titled 'My Sunflower'.$4
Entries.summer_10: Haley is going to bring her camera to the Luau, she's really excited.$1
Entries.fall_28: Seeing Vincent and Jas having fun at the Spirit's Eve yesterday made me think about having kids.$0#$e#I wonder if Haley has thought about it too...$4
Entries.spring_14_2: I've spent the last month painting a picture for Haley's birthday.$0#$b#It's titled 'My Sunflower'.$4
Entries.summer_10_2: Haley is going to bring her camera to the Luau, she's really excited.$1
Entries.fall_28_2: Seeing Vincent and Jas having fun at the Spirit's Eve yesterday made me think about having kids.$0#$e#I wonder if Haley has thought about it too...$4

Entries.Wed8: Hey, @.$0#$e#You know, I'd never move back to the city even though it was difficult to leave everything behind.$0#$b#I love living in the valley, and now that Haley and I are married, I have so many plans for us for the future.$1
Entries.Thu8: I've realised that when I moved here, I wasn't really trying to make new friends because I was still processing all the changes.$0#$b#But, now, I have made some really good friends and have a beautiful wife.$1
Entries.Fri8: I was afraid that I was rushing too much with Haley...$2#$b#You know that my previous relationship ended pretty badly and I had no plans to be with anybody when I moved here.$2#$b#But then Haley came and ruined my plans.$0#$e#I'm glad she did, I love her so much.$4#$b#I still can't believe she's my wife.$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: Oh, hey, @.$1#$e#Haley wanted me to help her developing some photos.$0#$e#I wonder... when will she move in with me now that we're married?$4
Entries.spring_Sat8: An old friend of mine from Zuzu City has told me that he's going to present his first art exhibition next month.$1#$b#I'm going with Haley, maybe she could met my parents while we're there.$1#$b#They couldn't come to the wedding and are really looking forward to meeting her.$0
Entries.winter_Sat8: This year has been the best in my life so far. Seeing how my art reaches more people, being married to Haley, having a good relationship with the other townsfolk... What's not to like?$0

Entries.Tue6: Leah's house is located in a place with a lot of positive energy.$0#$b#Maybe that's why I see Haley happier lately.$0
Entries.Wed8: At first I wasn't sure, but now I clearly see that the souls of Haley and Leah were made to be together.$0
Entries.Fri6: Leah gave Haley a beautiful painting last month.$0#$b#We've hung it in the living room.$1
Entries.Sat6: Haley has changed a lot since she started dating Leah, she seems like a completely different person.$0#$b#In the good sense, of course.$1
Entries.Sun6: Leah showed me some of her sculptures the other day.$0#$b#She is very talented.$1
Entries.Sun8: Leah has a really unique energy, I think she's a good influence on Haley.$0

Entries.Tue8: Leah's house is located in a place with a lot of positive energy.$0#$b#I'm sure it'd be good for Haley if they moved in together.$1
Entries.Fri8: Leah gave us a beautiful painting some time ago.$0#$b#We hung it in the living room, but Haley now says she wants to change it for one of their wedding photos.$0
Entries.Sat8: Haley has changed a lot, she seems like a completely different person.$0#$e#At first I thought it was a temporal effect of their blooming love, but it was not.$0#$b#I'm glad I could tell her how proud I'm of the person she has become.
